mapper.select: SELECT uus.trade_id AS tradeId, uus.channel_id AS channelId, uus.account_id AS accountId, uus.type, uus.type_name AS typeName, uus.amount, uus.fee, uus.serial_no AS serialNo, uto.state, (uto.max_amount - uto.amount) AS refundAmount, uus.created_time AS createdTime FROM upay_user_statement${strategy.partition} uus INNER JOIN upay_trade_order uto ON uus.trade_id = uto.trade_id WHERE uus.trade_id = #{filter.tradeId} AND uus.account_id = #{filter.accountId} AND uus.type NOT IN (70, 80)

SELECT uus.trade_id AS tradeId, uus.channel_id AS channelId, uus.account_id AS accountId, uus.type, uus.type_name AS typeName, uus.amount, uus.fee, uus.serial_no AS serialNo, uto.state, (uto.max_amount - uto.amount) AS refundAmount, uus.created_time AS createdTime FROM upay_user_statement${strategy.partition} uus INNER JOIN upay_trade_order uto ON uus.trade_id = uto.trade_id WHERE uus.trade_id = #{filter.tradeId} AND uus.account_id = #{filter.accountId} AND uus.type = 70
